title: Personalized Federated Learning via Low-Rank Matrix Factorization
details: A Dadras, SU Stich, A Yurtsever - OPT 2024: Optimization for Machine Learning
abstract: Personalized Federated Learning (pFL) has gained attention for building a suite of models tailored to different clients. In pFL, the challenge lies in balancing the reliance on local datasets, which may lack representativeness, against the diversity …

title: Insight-V: Exploring Long-Chain Visual Reasoning with Multimodal Large Language Models
details: Y Dong, Z Liu, HL Sun, J Yang, W Hu, Y Rao, Z Liu - arXiv preprint arXiv:2411.14432, 2024
abstract: Large Language Models (LLMs) demonstrate enhanced capabilities and reliability by reasoning more, evolving from Chain-of-Thought prompting to product-level solutions like OpenAI o1. Despite various efforts to improve LLM reasoning, high …
